review_join: I baught a printer from PC World and when I had problem with it went to the Bradford store to take it back
When I said I had purchased it from them on EBAY and they had it on their system they said they would not deal with it
So I phoned PC World and they said I had to contact them via EBAY
I rang the number they gave me NO ASWER so I tried to contact them via ebay nearly 2 month ago and to date have still not heard from them
What load of rubish if they were my staff when I managed shop I would have shown them the doore
But it is not the first time I have had problem with their staff in their shop they were very abrupt and with atitued
It is not the first time I have purchased on line and taken it back they replaced it on that occasion
The problem with large company is that they do not care and forget that it is we the public that keep them going
I have walked out on many occasion because I could find staff to help me and if you do find one they are like little Hitlers
iT IS NOT GOOD ENOUGH and they are not the cheapest on the market what ever they say
I have had to purchase a new printer from else where a I needed it for work do PC WORLD CARE NO
I am never dealing with them again I know other firm that are cheeper and look after their customer far better

Purchased an item from curry last Saturday 1600for delivery Friday 10th May waited in for the four hour slot given only to have phone call at 1915 to say that they had run out of driver hour and could not deliver till next Tuesday
what happened to Saturday and Monday
Needless to say we cancelled the Oder at the shop and we will never purchase anything from them again
Looking on line two other company could have delivered the next day but we thought it would be better to purchase locally how wrong we were
I bought a new Beko washing machine from Currys and on delivery found that a container for liquid soap mentioned in the manual wa not supplied
The store phoned Beko for me and they said the part would be delivered a soon a possible
When the part had not arrived after a week I received an email from Beko saying I would have to pay for it
I went back to the store and they only phoned Beko after I insisted
Beko gave Currys the same reply despite Bekos employee making a promise to Currys over the phone which wa not kept
Beko sent me supposed evidence very weak proving that this part is an extra
It is absolutely ridiculous that they both made such a stand about a part worth penny but essential for full use of the machine Whatever happened to customer satisfaction
I left the store after telling the manager that company only stayed in business by giving good customer service
No wonder people are shopping on the internet with service like this
I had a problem with my computer last Sunday the 5th of May
I decided to take it to Currys PC world at TorquayThe engineer wa Balazs who wa wonderful he did a wonderful job and fixed my computer
I am very grateful for his help
Thank you very much
Following on from my previous review I have now been offered 435 half the price paid for my broken product
When I have challenged this decision I have been told by the social medium team that I would have to speak to the chief exec of the company
Horrific experience encountered overall with Currys
Currently looking into legal advice
Buckle up folk because I am about to tell you all about my nightmare experience with this companyOrdered a fridge and washing machine from them 27th April at the White City store
The system were down but we were assured that our delivery date of a week later would be met for both item and that we would get a telephone call confirming this the next day
No surprise there wa no phone call
It reached Tuesday and we got in touch to check all wa ok for our agreed date
No surprise again that there wa a problem getting the fridge for then
After speaking with three different people we were told the delivery date would be the 8th then the 9th and then 29th May
Absolute debacle so we cancelled the fridge order and continued with the washing machine
Paid for installation and they met agreed delivery date of 4th May
Guy came and installed it blocking access to kitchen cupboard I asked him to move it to the other space we have for it and the guy say no it is done now switched on a test wash and left
So we called back to ask someone to move it and install it
Guy come out two day later doe it also leaf after turning on a test wash 15 minute later we call the guy back to ask him to check it a the machine is not draining no response
Called Currys customer service line they sent another team today 10th May and they have identified a problem with the machine
we have been unable to do laundry for two week
we have been passed from pillar to post through curry various customer service team and they keep passing u off to bosch
No sense of urgency or customer care from this company
Absolutely rubbish service and a complete nightmare when you are trying to move house

I can honestly say pop into the store to look at the product and get it online from another business because this experience ha been an utter farceUPDATE thanks for responding to my review and providing a contact email address
Retailers complain that customer are abandoning store and shopping with online competitor but maybe if their stock control wa better they may find they get more direct custom
The last few time I have gone to Currys to buy item white Echo SpotDyson dehumidifierEpson printer they have been out of stock
I wa happy to get the printer delivered but inexplicably it wa not available for home delivery and the nearest stock wa at a store far away from both my nearest branch
So a much a I want to support physical store they need to up their game first

Had a look around for a new range cooker there wa a good choice in curry also compared other internet site but there wa not much between themSo decided to go with Currys only issue wa the cost of installation 100 so I had a local guy to install it for me cost 80 But it wa delivered on time and two helpful guy all in all a good service
Be careful about what you buy
Curry is aware of possible software issue but will not let you know of their existence when you buy
And how software problem can generate random error they keep silent until you need service for the purchased item
And a the warranty doe not cover the sotware side I wish you success in shopping from the curry
Just visited the Southend on Sea Branch
Firstly Ordered a product that arrived a day late at store
Secondly the item arrived with the packaging already opened with a used product insideThirdly received the most vile and disgusting attitude from the duty manager Andy
Currys is without doubt already known to be Britains worst electrical retailer
Thank you Andy for making my experience with Currys one of the worst in history
Hopefully enough people will complain about your disgusting attitude and total disregard for customer and Currys will fire you
I bought a fridge on Friday with a commitment to deliver on the following Wednesday
All good exactly the day we wanted
I got a text to say delivery would be between 1610 and 2010
OK not ideal but we can cope someone wa in the whole timeThey did not show up
NO message no phone
Meanwhile the freezer food go to waste
The switch board close at 2000 so we cannot ring them
But the online tracker say delivery on Friday
Seemed to forget there wa a day inbetweenRing today to find out what happened
Drivers had reached there hour limit for the day
I understand this from a HS point of view
But this wa obvious from the start
So my assessment do not believe a word that is said
do not expect any communication that is helpful do not expect proactive behaviour and generally look to buy from a store that delivers every time when they say they will
AVOID AT ALL COSTS
Went into the Watford branch to order an American fridge freezer a whole month ago
Arranged delivery waited in all day for no one to turn up
When i called to find out where they were i wa told they were in an accident and they would rearange delivery for the next day
I had to arrange for someone to be home a i had taken the privious day off work for the delivery
When i arrived home that day i found they had delivered the wrong one
Its wa a much smaller cheaper one
When i called them they said they could not collect for almost a week

When they eventually came to pick it up the delivery guy came in took one look at it and said that they did not have the tool to take it away and they would have to rearrange for someone else to collect
So a few day later they collect it but i still did not receive my fridge freezer
Yesterday it wa meant to be delivered but AGAIN the delivery guy have an excuse not to do their job
They cannot leave the truck it too big to move etc And again delivery wa arranged for today they turn up start looking for the fridge freezer to eventually be told they do not have on the lorry
I have lost 7 day loss of earnings god know how much on phone call to customer service who have been useless
Needless to say we have cancelled our order and taking our money to a compnay who know what they are doing
We have waited a whole month in total just to get a fridge freezer

If you are looking for a branch of Currys where customer knowledge and service is non existent then just pop into the Sydenham branch you will not be disappointed by their general apathy and total lack of knowledge of the product that they sellApart from spending your time looking for a salesperson who is actually there to serve you and that take some doing you will then struggle to find anyone that actually ha any knowledge of the product that they are sellingMostly the same product can be found at a branch of John Lewis where the customer service and product knowledge put the Currys staff to shameOf course I cannot say for sure that all branch of Currys are of the same poor standard of the Sydenham branch in South East London but I certainly would look elsewhere for a more professional service and if you must buy from Currys choose another branch than Sydenham

I do not really need to write this i could just post link to hundred of other customer who are explaining how curry are telling people there item are on the waythen explaining the driver is over his allowed hour or the van he is driving ha broken downThis company must have share in RAC the amount of time they brake downIt is quite obvious that they are using these excuse to myself and all customer to get the extra guaranteed amount out of u which is a lieI wa told the driver wa 30mins from my homethen he wa unable to fulfill my delivery a he had gone over his allowed driving timeI wa told i could expect a delivery Sundaythis is wrong we are being lied to by this company
Bought a camera in Nov18 and 2 month later it developed a fault  a few line down the side of the screen
Returned it to Currys who sent it 4 day later to the manufacturer
In the 4 day it wa in store it somehow developed an internal crack all the way across the screen

The store say contact Head Office and Head Office say contact the store
Also the detail of the sale and all email cannot be found in their system
This ha been ongoing for 3 month and I have had to involve a solicitor to resolve this
I will never buy from Currys again
BEWARE  if you purchase anything just hope it doe not malfunction a they will do everything to get out of it
Ordered a washerdryer and paid for delivery on a Wednesday
Wednesday morning come
I spoke to the delivery driver and guided him to my house200 metre away from my house and six minute later he hung up and drove off saying that he could not find my house
This wa incredibly frustratingCalled up customer service and they assured me that the appliance would be delivered between 3pm and 4pm

I called customer service again at 4pm to be told that the driver wa on his way to depot a he had finished his shiftWas offered Sunday delivery and then Friday deliverySUNDAY AND FRIDAY ARE NOT WEDNESDAY

it is unbelievable that someone who wa 200 metre away from a house could not find it despite verbal instruction and even an annotated google map pictureI need other appliance but I will shop at a competitor who will actually deliver on their promise and deliver what I purchased

Put a gun to my head over the cancellation Egift card purchase
So recently a burglary took place at my flat in which a number of item got stolen

A traumatic time for my partner and I I had the option of Amazon voucher but instead I opted for the curryspcworld gift card option because there were a number of desirable replacement that had caught my eye online
I went online and purchased 5 item one evening and thought all wa rosy and looking forward to my Sunday delivery
However on the Saturday morning I noticed that one item Anker sound core speaker wa an inferior model to the one I had previously and more expensive than on Amazon
I called the Know how team and asked if this part of my order could be cancelled a refund of 4999 and proceed with the delivery of the rest of the order totalling 141699
I wa told that the only way I could receive the refund wa primarily in E voucher despite spending an additional 190 with Currys on my debit card on top of my 1276 egift
I did not want the speaker back on creditgift card it wa just a simply mistake
Now I have to wait 35 working day for the voucher to come through the post although despite this advertisement in their cancellation email over the phone I wa told it could take up to 7days
False advertising
So due to CurrysPC world contorted refund policy I will now have to wait 12 week before I can get the item I ordered
I will undoubtedly end up spending le at CurrysPCworld a a result due to the bitter taste this process ha left in my mouth
So instead on that additional 190 profit they could have had I will no longer get the bose speaker system I had intended to purchase out of principle
The Knowhow teamCurrys could have provided better customer service during what should be a nice shopping experience after the trauma of a burglary
Also if CurrysPC world were such a stickler for refunding in the manner which it wa purchased then why did not I get my Egift voucher in the manner in which I wa given it ie back email
I will reconsider buying from elsewhere ie Amazon in the future le stress
I will also feed the experience back to my home insurance provider in the hope they choose to work with a more professional outfit in the future

We have just experienced our first so called valet service and all we can say is do not waste your money it wa anything but a service and wa certainly NOT a valet and we have large number of picture to prove it

Let down told lie and left with a non working fridge drink dispenser after a so called valet by a so called knowhow operative who did not knowhow to clean it so did not bother to even try then told u he wa going to arrange for an engineer to call and deal with it but a this wa over a week ago and we have not heard from Currys we must assume just another lie and that ha not been arranged either
This misery started Just over a year ago when our fridgefreezer broke and we headed to Currys for a replacement

After speaking with some helpful shop staff we decided on an American unit a a good deal wa being offered but after 3 failed delivery attempt one due to rain yes we were told they could not deliver because it had been raining
so we gave up and got a refund
Still needing a fridgefreezer we were drawn back by a deal on a normal Samsung unit
Having explained our previous poor experience to the manager we were assured of delivery first time and our broken unit wa taken away a a good will gesture
So far so good and with the new unit we took out a 5 year service plan
We were advised each year the unit would be cleaned and receive an anti bacterial treatment
We mentioned our concern about the drink dispenser and previous experience with poor functioning after a period of time and were told all would be sorted a a part of the annual Valet service

When the operative arrived we mentioned that the drink dispenser wa not working properly to be told sorry I cannot touch that you will need to get an engineer out TO CLEAN A DRINKS DISPENSER we thought you are joking
Well he wa not because he never even looked at it let alone clean it what a waste of time
After le than 20 minute 10 of which wa spent on his phone and speaking to my son and he wa gone

We had a look before putting anything back in the fridgefreezer only to discover little to nothing had been cleaned so my son and his partner spent the next hour cleaning it properly before we could refill it

We decided to write and complain about your failure to deliver the level of service suggested by your staff at the time the agreement wa made being that the fridge freezer would be cleaned to a high standard with anti bacterial product and the water dispenser would be checked cleaned and fully functional on completion
Of which none of the above wa true

When deciding to write this review we had no idea of the scale of customer failure Currys were responsible for more than 60 of customer being dissatisfied beginning to look like Comet and we know what happened there
Take note DSG Retail no customer no business and it seems you are losing them fast to company like AOcom online

A decent retailer having failed to meet the standard their own contract implies would compensate the customer for the time and trouble in preparing the fridge freezer for cleaning and offer a full refund of money paid
We will see

We ordered a dishwasher that wa delivered and installed by two men from Teamknowhow
They left the machine running but did not check it wa operating correctly before they left
After waiting some time we noticed that nothing seemed to be happening so we opened it door and saw it wa registering a fault
The manual said this could be caused by a faulty water supply or the feed pipe being blocked or twisted
The supply wa fine so we called Teamknowhow and wa told this wa most likely the water pipe being twisted and that they would send the installation team back to check

A while later the installation team called on the phone and said there wa no point in them coming back to u because they knew they would installed it correctly and that this type of dishwasher broke down quite often funnily enough it wa getting quite late in the afternoon and we suspected they had just wanted to go home

Shortly afterwards the Teamknowhow office called and seemed surprised that the installation team had called u and even more surprised that they had told u they would not come out to u and that this type of dishwasher often had problem
They then arranged for an installation team to visit the following morning
When they arrived they were surprised to see it wa a built in dishwasher and said they would only been allotted 15 minute to sort this out
One of them then put his arm under the dishwasher to feel the pipe and assured me they were not twisted and that the dishwasher must be faulty
A visit by an engineer wa arranged for the following Wednesday
My wife stayed in all day for the engineer to arrive and within a matter of minute he told her the water feed pipe WAS twisted and that he had corrected it
The dishwasher ha since worked perfectly
TeamKnowhow installers clearly do not know what they are on about and do not care about the service they give

I purchased a Logik fridge freezer from Currys last October
Five month later it ha developed an earth fault which mean it trip the electricity supply to the house
It doe this about 6 time a day
I contacted Currys on Friday 15th March and within an hour a local repair company contacted me to arrange a visit  for Monday 18th
The guy came said it wa a evaporator that had likely failed and he would have to order the part
They would contact me when it arrives to arrange a date to return and fit
On Wednesday 20th I contacted them to learn that the part is on back order  meaning it is not in stock and there is no indication when they will arrive
So I contacted Currys Customer Service department to request a replacement fridge freezer only to be told that it is policy to wait three week before considering a replacement
that is three week of having the device trip the electricity  having to reset clock on cooker and central heating system

Last weekend we had a weekend away I had to take every item out of the fridge freezer and pack my son and daughter fridge freezer with my stock because the fridge will have tripped and the content ruined
If an electrical item develops an earth fault and continually trip your electricity supply you would disconnect it
And for item which are infrequently used it is an inconvenience

But for a fridge that need to run 247 and cannot be isolated the frustration of having to live with a fault product that is causing so much grief and have Currys customer service shrug their shoulder and say come back in three week I find particularly galling
Needless to say it is highly unlikely I will ever buy another product from Currys and I would suggest you enquire about warrantiesguarantees with the salesperson before you do

My dishwasher of 14 year broke and I wanted a replacement a soon a possible

We have just encountered a warranty problem with a Samsung washing machine purchased in 2015 from Currys store in Belmont Durham
We bought the machine directly from Currys with the socalled 5 year part and labour warranty
It halt midprogramme and is a major problem to empty and get to the end of any programme

Following many phone call to Samsung agent reading from the same script we were fobbed off with Do you have proof of the registration of the warranty despite giving them the reference number and emailing them all the sale document including receipt
We then went to the Currys store in Belmont Durham that we bought the machine from and waited in a long line of customer complaining about their warranty not being honoured
There were approximately 20 sale people on the floor and 2 person dealing with the line of unhappy customer with warranty issue
We gave all the document to the staff person dealing with complaint and he said they would be in touch within 72 hour

On the final day we received a letter claiming that our machine wa out of warranty but Currys were offering a 14499 voucher to spend on a new washing machine in full and final settlement a it wa uneconomical to repair
When we rang the number to speak to the sender of the letter it wa explained that the only route they could offer wa the Out of warranty route which wa a voucher towards the purchase a new one
When I stated that we bought a 5 year part and labour warranty and wanted it repaired they explained that Currys only cover the first 2 year then the next 3 are supposed to be covered by Samsung
This is a blatant case of misselling a none of this wa explained at the point of sale and we only bought it because we thought we had 5 year cover

When we explained that the voucher wa no good a we would never buy another thing from Currys they offered a direct payment by BACS into our account within a further 72 hour if we accepted it a full and final settlement
So to summarise there are 2 lesson learned here  1
Currys missell their product with impunity and are not to be trusted so do not buy anything from them and 2

Samsung provide product which do not last a long a advertised and do not honour any warranty that they allegedly provide and furthermore have preprepared script for agent to fend off long and many call from people who have bought these warranty in good faith so do not buy Samsung product period

We paid over the top for the washing machine for peace of mind and have learned a costly lesson but hopefully our bad experience will help other consumer to make the right choice when shopping both in term of who to buy from and which brand not to touch with a barge pole
YoursNeil Mckie

I also did not want to waste any more time with curry but the public have a right to know how I wa treated a a paying customerI called up Currys customer service line about the second week of January and said I am interest in a particular American Style Fridge Freezer LG GSL961PZBV and I also work in Oxford Street
Do you know what time it close and doe it have the one I want on show
The agent come back say yes we do have that particular product at our Oxford Street branch and if you order today you will get it in about 2 week and store close at 830pm
I said thanks and wa abit dubious about the delivery time because on there website it said 1021 daysI finish work at 730pm thinking I got plenty of time so I got a bite to eat a it only down the road
Long story short I came to the store at roughly 8pm and a I approached to come in a representative of curry say it closing now
I said do not you close at 830
no we close at 8 but a I mention the product I want a I am guessing it wa a high ticket item he became very interested and wanted to help
At this point he mention there no fridge freezer at our store but you can pay for it here if you want
As frustrated a I wa I continued with the order but a the guy wa putting through the order he did it like it wa an online transaction
I said if that is how you do thing in the shop I could of done this at home because what he wa doing wa identical to the online website

Then his manager say actually that is not how it done and get told off from his manager but it wa too late and he put it through a an online transactionAt this point 2 week pas and call customer service and query where is my fridge
There response wa where waiting on stock and when we do we will send you a text message of the date of delivery
Two week pas I get a text delivery is scheduled for Monday but no time slot
Its sunday now and still no time slot so I called them to tell them I have no time slot
There response wa you will receive a text about 10pm today with a time slot
I said please then I can notify work if it a half day or full day of work since it unpaidIts Monday still no time slot so I took a whole day off work
I called them again saying why did not you send me a text message with the time slot
Agent apology and say we had problem with our system but your delivery is scheduled for 26
I wa so annoyed and explained due to your mistake I could of worked half a day but you cost me a whole day without pay

His response showed no empathy or compassion and offered no good will gesture so I just hung upDay of the delivery they arrive at 7pm mind you I could of worked a normal and they were late but I did not want to spike my stress level and complain
Also to let you know I paid for recycling and installation upon delivery
The lorry pull up and I asked if he could remove the packaging so I can see the condition of the product
As he removed the packaging it wa so badly damaged to the point bit and piece were hanging out
Driver agreed that we had to reschedule delivery for another date

Driver called curry to tell them the product wa so badly damaged and also asked if there wa another in stock so that he could deliver it for another day but just my luck no stock availableI called curry again to try to re arrange another date but they said we have to wait for the driver to get back to the warehouse to log it on his system that it wa damaged
I replied back saying but you just spoke to the driver and I also have proof of picture but they were not having it
I had to wait a few day for the driver to update his system
Three day pas called curry again ha your system been updated
There reply wa yes so we continued to trying to reschedule another date but informed me next delivery is in 4 week
I then explain that the driver told me that you are due stock this week but the agent informs me that they have been already allocated to people
At this point I wa about to explode I explain do not you think a mistake like this should be prioritised to me a I have been waiting longer than those customer who have just recently purchased

You would think this would make perfect sense a if you can explain to your customer that you had problem with previous delivery and it might take longer to receive there fridge to unforeseen circumstance I am sure they will understand

That fact you communicate with the customer show good customer service skill but curry do not bother with anything There reply wa it out of my hand and I guess you would have to wait until we send you a text message with a date

What I am getting with curry it that under no circumstance do they want to help the customer even though it there faultAll this is going on I did not receive any compensation and not even help to try to sort this out quickly
Three week pas I look at there website and it showing that the fridge I ordered can be delivered for next day delivery but I found it odd why I wa not notified because I am still waiting on stock
So I called them again and queried why do you have my fridge available for next day delivery for a new customer if I am still waiting on mine

They put me on hold of 10mins to query this and there reply wa this seems to be a mistake a we do not have stock available and he advised me that if I wa to go through that process you would only get a email saying no stock available
Did they change it on there website
of course not they let customer order thinking they were going to get next deliveryI am lost for word at this point because how doe a company a big a curry treat customer with a lack of respect
I wa tempted to get a refund but knowing how long they take to do anything I bet that would take another month of two
So I stuck with it and received text message for saturday delivery
Perfect since I am off and also got a early time slot of 91pm
The issue I am having here is wasting food again because I defrosedt the fridge last time and all sort of problem happened that day
Anyways day of the delivery they show up and took off the packaging and it look good
Also the fridge fit through my door so installation wa not required but I did not want to call them back a they are uselessLet this be a lesson for anyone who try to order from curry
Stay well clear from them because they do not care about the consumer

Just look at me you would of thought paying 1500 for a fridge including insurance installation and recycling would of mean curry valued your business but no they want to make it a difficult they can for the customer
Let it be known that if something go wrong which is highly likely then good luck I say

I bought a Microsoft Surface Book 2 from CurrysPCworld towards the end of February 2018

Within the first month I experienced problem with it and these continued and worsened throughout 2018 until I wa forced to stop using it the screen would not detach or take a few attempt after minute my battery life wa almost nonexistent and the charger wa very temperamental  the slightest touch and it would stop charging the final straw with this wa it taking me 4 different main socket around my house for it to actually charge

I have experienced BSoD or Blue Screen of Death multiple time for no apparent reason at all and finally I bought this for use with my design job however whenever I would load any Adobe program like Photoshop Illustrator etc
the Surface Book 2 would become incredibly slow and the fan sounded like a jet engine preparing for take off
Now you may be wondering why I did not return it within the first month

I have explained this to at least 10 different staff member at CurrysPC World from customer service to management staff on March 3rd 2018 I suffered a suspected TIA a mini stroke  This lead to me being hospitalised and having multiple trip to hospital over a 3 month period for scan and test etc

And on June 25th 2018 I wa admitted to hospital with a potentially fatal heart infection called Infective Endocarditis I had a very intense course of IV Antibiotics over 1 month in which I wa admitted permanently to hospital I very nearly needed emergency openheart surgery a I came very close to Dying
Once discharged at the end of July I wa bedbound for a further 6 week while continuing a course of harsh antibiotic
It ha taken 8 month and I am just now getting towards the end of my physical recovery from this

The reason I came extremely close to dying from this infection and why it ha taken so long for me to recover is because I have had a heart condition since birth called Critical Aortic Stenosis and have had 4 OpenHeart Surgeries which were spread out from the age of 6 week old along with 2 keyhole surgery in which an artificial valve wa placed within the pulmonary valve of my heart  a it is artificial titanium stent with a material valve inside it ha no way of fighting bacteria and the Infective Endocarditis had started to attack this valveAs you can probably imagine returning a faulty laptop had been the least of my worry for most of last year plus the fact I wa literally physically incapable of returning this laptop to you
As I have stated countless time I can also provide absolute proof of my hospitalisation and all of my health issue stated above should you need it

I have been in contact with at least 10 different member of staff I have worked with Resolver who taught me about certain law in which I am protected such a The Sales of Goods Act 1979 along with the Consumer Rights Act 2015

Despite knowing these law and how I am within my right to receive an entirely different laptop of my choice plus knowing of my reason for not returning within the first 28 day of purchase due to Valid Health Reasons You a a company have refused to cooperate  I have received the same 1 sentence reply from almost every member of staff from customer service all the way to management of I must get a repair a it is outside of the 28 day return period

I have even complied with this and sent my Surface Book 2 to be repaired at the Microsoft Repair Centre in Germany and they have sent me back the exact same laptop and have stated that they have not serviced it due to a mismatch in serial number  I gave them the exact serial number that wa on the original packaging which You CurrysPC World gave me when I first purchased the Surface Book 2 from youI would also like to add that when I explained my reasoning to a particular senior member of staff named Yasmin whom customer service redirected me to she became very aggressive and refused to listen to a word I wa saying she said and I quote I understand but I still do not see why you could not do anything when I explained to her that I almost died from this heart infection
When I asked to speak to a manager she said You do not need to speak to a manager I am a senior member of staff
From the moment I wa redirected to her she wa open about her refusal to help me and even denied any knowledge of my previous contact with CurrysPC WorldI am well and truly disgusted by CurrysPC World
I have stopped all payment to Creation until you resolve this issue

I have stated what I would like to happen many time in my contact with yourselves I hope it ha been noted in my complaint reference a I wa told it would beMy PC World Complaint Reference is CC3844010My Resolver Case Reference is RES6145308I am going to continue posting this to your social medium a well
Thank you
